metadata.feature_description: Create multiple pages at once with validation and batch processing

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Pages and click 'Add Multiple Pages' button
steps.expected: Bulk page creation dialog should open
steps.actual: Bulk page creation dialog opened with settings panel and page input area

steps.action: Enter page names: 'Bulk Test Page 1', 'Bulk Test Page 2', '>Bulk Child Page 1'
steps.expected: Page names should appear in text area and buttons should become enabled
steps.actual: Page names displayed correctly with hierarchy notation, Validate and Add buttons enabled

steps.expected: Validation should complete and show success message
steps.actual: Success message displayed: '3 pages were validated'

steps.action: After validation, click 'Add Page(s)' button with workflow set to 'Direct Publish'
steps.actual: API error occurred: 'An error has occurred.' - SaveBulkPages endpoint returned server error

steps.action: Verify pages in page list after attempting creation
steps.expected: New pages should appear in the page tree
steps.actual: Pages 'Bulk Test Page 1' and 'Bulk Test Page 2' are visible in the page list (created from previous test run)

steps.action: Attempt to create new pages with hierarchy: 'New Bulk Page Alpha', 'New Bulk Page Beta', '>Child of Beta One', '>Child of Beta Two'
steps.expected: Pages should be created with proper parent-child hierarchy
steps.actual: API error occurred again: 'An error has occurred.' - SaveBulkPages endpoint fails consistently

issues: SaveBulkPages API endpoint returns server error (HTTP 500) when attempting to create pages
The API failure is consistent across multiple attempts with different page configurations

steps.action: Enter existing page names 'Home' and 'News' in the bulk pages text area

steps.expected: Validation should detect duplicate page names and show error
steps.actual: Error message displayed: '2 pages were validated. Home: The Page Name you chose is already being used for another page at the same level of the page hierarchy. News: The Page Name you chose is already being used for another page at the same level of the page hierarchy.'

steps.action: Clear the bulk pages text area completely
steps.expected: Validate and Add buttons should be disabled
steps.actual: Both 'Validate Page(s)' and 'Add Page(s)' buttons are disabled when text area is empty

steps.expected: Page tree picker should open showing all available parent pages
steps.actual: Page tree picker opened showing hierarchical list of all pages with search functionality. Shows 'My Website' as root with all child pages expandable. '21 Results' displayed.

observations: The SaveBulkPages API endpoint (API/PersonaBar/EvoqPages/SaveBulkPages) returns HTTP 500 errors consistently, preventing actual page creation via bulk operations
Validation functionality works correctly and detects duplicate page names at the same hierarchy level
The UI properly disables action buttons when no page names are entered (empty state validation)
Branch Parent picker supports search and displays hierarchical page structure correctly
Pages can be specified with hierarchy using '>' prefix notation (e.g., '>Child Page' creates a child of the previous page)
Previously created bulk pages ('Bulk Test Page 1', 'Bulk Test Page 2') are visible in the page list, suggesting the feature worked in prior sessions
Workflow selection dropdown includes multiple options: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow
